page.title: 06Wheatsheaf Centre in Sheldon
page.content: The Wheatsheaf is a hotel on the Coventry Road. It is a busy hotel and has many customers. It has a large car park which leads to a bus stop. It has many customers because of the many shops that surround it. The hotel has stood since the early Eighteenth century when it started as a coaching inn. The hotel itself is situated at the junction of Coventry Road and of Lode Lane. These extremely busy roads help to make this shopping centre a good one. There are 132 shops in all and the majority of this number is made up of 75 services and 25 food and drink shops. There are also many other varieties which make this an excellent shopping centre.
